block.p: DOREMUS-Jeanette. On June 26, 2000. Loving mother of William Henry and Bette Taylor. Also survived by six grandchildren and two great-grandchildren. Memorial service will held July 15, 2000, 10:00 AM at St. Paul's Methodist Church, Northport, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in Jeanette's memory to the VNSHospice of Suffolk, 505 Main St., Northport, NY or The Fire Island Lighthouse Preservation Society (FILPS), 4640 Captree Island, Captree, New York 11702-4601.
